mapper.select: SELECT com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 0, 10) as com_reg_date, SUBSTR(com_mod_date,0,10) as com_mod_date, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_manager_email, com_contract_stat, com_contract_type, com_homePage, com_address, com_contract_agree, com_tel from company

select * from company
WHERE com_name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
WHERE com_contract_name LIKE '%' || #{contractName} || '%'

SELECT com_id, com_name, SUBSTR(com_reg_date, 0, 10) as com_reg_date, SUBSTR(com_mod_date,0,10) as com_mod_date, com_contract_name, com_manager_phone, com_manager_email, com_contract_stat, com_contract_type, com_homePage, com_address, com_contract_agree, com_tel from company where com_contract_type = '협약 완료' order by com_reg_date
